text: �But as for monasticism, they invented it�He said:Monasticism (rahbāniyya) is derived from the word rahba which means fear. It refers to adherenceto [a state of] fear without any earnest desire (ṭamaʿ). We had not prescribed it for them, that is, We did not demand that they worship Us in that way.
